synopsis.text:
Akemi, a stripper with a heart of gold, takes in Jin Kanzaki, a young boy with a mysterious angel mark on his hand, after he saves her. Despite his seemingly ordinary life, Jin harbors a secret: he possesses superhuman abilities that draw the attention of a shadowy organization searching for him under the name Zet. As Jin becomes entangled in a world of dangerous creatures known as Players, he must confront his true nature and the question of whether he is a hero fighting for justice or just another monster.

Meanwhile, Kouga Amagi, a wealthy young man with a strong sense of justice, uses his inheritance and technological prowess to become the superhero Alphas, battling against the Players that threaten humanity. Despite their differing backgrounds, Jin and Kouga's fates become intertwined as they clash in a face-off between rival heroes. Will they be able to put aside their differences and work together to protect mankind, or will their rivalry lead to disaster? Only time will tell in this thrilling anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
